name: v0.7.0
body:
## Features

### Voice Templates
- Add database schema and Durable Object infrastructure for voice templates
- Add API routes with CRUD operations and middleware enhancements
- Add frontend template management components (TemplateList, TemplateEditor, TemplateGallery)
- Integrate voice templates into app navigation
- Add comprehensive API endpoint tests

## Fixes

- Fix TemplateGallery card styling
- Resolve test failures across frontend and API workers
  - Update Base UI selectors for component tests
  - Fix route conflicts in API worker
  - Add proper OpenAPI schema metadata

## Documentation

- Add voice templates feature documentation

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keyreply/kira-cloudflare/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0
